application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Addition of sliding door in south elevation, increase in balcony depth. Erection of staircase and alteration to dormer in office block. Erection of single storey rear outbuilding, climbing frame with swing and privacy screen fence. Installation of AC units and landscaping (Retrospective)
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the submitted application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The rating level of the noise determined by the cumulative sound emissions of the plant to which this permission relates shall be at least 5dBA lower than the existing background noise level at any given time of operation. The noise levels shall be measured or predicted 1m externally to any window at the nearest residential facade and the measurements and assessment shall be made according to BS 4142:2014.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D14 of the London Plan 2021 policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Prior to beneficial occupation of the development to which this permission relates, the drainage system as shown in CIV01 P4 Surface Water Drainage Layout shall be implemented in full and permanently maintained thereafter.Reason: To prevent the development from increasing the risk of flooding to the site itself or elsewhere, in accordance with policy SI13 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS1 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Prior to beneficial occupation of the development to which this permission relates, further evidence (photographs and installation contracts) to demonstrate that the sustainable drainage scheme for the site has been completed in accordance with the drainage strategy shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The sustainable drainage scheme shall be managed and maintained thereafter in accordance with the agreed management and maintenance plan for all of the proposed drainage components.Reason: To comply with the Non-Statutory Technical Standards for Sustainable Drainage Systems, the National Planning Policy Framework (Paragraph 182), the London Plan (Policies SI 12 and SI 13) along with associated guidance to thesepolicies.

The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the Planning Fire Safety Strategy hereby approved and thereafter maintained.Reason: In the interests of Fire Safety and to ensure the safety of all building users in accordance with Policy D12 (Fire safety) of the London Plan 2021.

Prior to beneficial use of the patio area, the evergreen privacy screening hereby approved and as indicated on the drawings ref 36-069 shall be installed in full and permanently retained thereafter.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Prior to beneficial use of the A/C units in the north and south elevations, the measures contained within the Noise Impact Assessment 14th December 2024 Issue 01, Chapter 5.5 Mitigation Measures shall be implemented in full and permanently retained thereafter.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for future occupants of the development and neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D14 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
